definition: river conservancy works (dike maintenance, dredging etc)/river conservancy worker

sentences.english: Vertical velocity distribution of distorted model is not similar.
sentences.chinese: 變態河工模型垂線流速分佈是不相似的。

sentences.english: At noon the men came to shore for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 在中午時，河工們開始在岸邊喫午飯。

sentences.english: Resistance similarity between prototype and model must be satisfied in the distorted river model.
sentences.chinese: 變態河工模型中，原型和模型之間要求滿足阻力相似。

definition: (old) to transport by water/to ship grain as tax
land tax/money and grain (given as tax or tribute)
inspector-general of province in Ming and Qing times
imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
Ming and Qing dynasty province directly administered by Beijing, including Beijing, Tianjin, most of Hebei and Henan and part of Shandong
to supervise (troops)/to appoint (officers)/to select and assign
